channel.title: Soup on Luca Bruno blog
channel.description: Recent content in Soup on Luca Bruno blog

item.title: Fetch web page with Vala and Soup
item.description: Hello, I’m lately using the Vala language widely. I find it a great and well designed language. You may know I’m the maintainer of Freespeak. This program is written in Python. Now I’m rewriting it in Vala, both for providing a good and really simple API in C and for learning Vala. I will now paste a snippet from the new freespeak code that I use for creating a cancellable asyncronous operation for fetching a web page using libsoup either with a GET or a POST method.
